name: Start Cube TapTap Fun
description:
Start Cube TapTap Fun!!
Play this fun puzzle matching game for free! Work your way through hundreds of colorful levels, solve puzzles and pop all the cubes. Challenge family and friends and see who can complete all the missions and clear levels, it’s fun and super addictive.

HOW TO PLAY
- Click on any 2 adjacent cubes of the same color to blast.
- Play through hundreds of challenging levels.
- Overcome obstacles and achieve high scores.
- Clear the board and win points.
